courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CHEM 104; HORT 421 or IB 420.
description: Factors affecting growth, development, and quality of horticultural crops, such as photoperiodism, growth regulators, and carbon dioxide levels. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CHEM 104; HORT 421 or IB 420.
label: Growth and Dev of Hort Crops
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to MS:Crop Sciences -UIUC, MS:Crop Sciences -UIUC, MS: FSHN (Online) -UIUC, MS:FSci &Hmn Nutrition -UIUC, MS: Agricultural Educ -UIUC, MS: Agricultural Educatn -UIUC, MS:Nat Res Env Sci -UIUC, MS:Nat Res & Envrn Sci -UIUC, NDEG:Grad Nondegree-CE-UIUC, or NDEG:Undergrad Nondeg-CE-UIUC.
